alternativeNames: Adams, Michael Friedrich; Adam, Johann Friedrrich; Adam, Johannes Michael Friedrich; Adam, J.I.
comments: 'J.I.Adam' in Fl. Rep. Soc. Romania, 13: 135 (1976) is a misprint. See note on variations of name in TL2, VOL1: 8 (1976)
examples: Cucubalus multifidus Adams Beitr. Naturk. (Weber & Mohr) 1: 57. (1805)
